definition: lit. one half equals zero point five (division rule in abacus reckoning)/to share fairly between two parties/to go fifty-fifty
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: We split it two ways and your worries are over.
sentences.chinese: 我们二一添作五，这样，你的烦恼就解除了。

definition: lit. 1 divided by 16 is 0.0625 (abacus rule)/fig. to deny responsibility/to pass the buck/also written 一推六二五[yi1 tui4 liu4 er4 wu3]
to hog/to keep everything for oneself
to share the booty/to divide ill-gotten gains
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to commandeer/to take over for the state
lit. don't let one's own fertile water flow into others' field/fig. keep the goodies within the family (proverb)
pinyin: fei2 shui3 bu4 liu2 wai4 ren2 tian2

definition: loan settled (business term)/business complete to the satisfaction of both parties
to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
